column2:
lanka <- read_csv("wfp_food_prices_lka.csv") %>% 
  filter(!row_number() %in% c(1)) %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(longitude, latitude, price, usdprice),
            ~ as.numeric(.x)) %>% 
  mutate(date = ymd(date), 
         year = year(date)) %>% 
  mutate(source = "WFP")
